name: Argo Astronautics T-shirt
description: This orange shirt features the logo of Argo Astronautics. Before changing their name, the company was known as AR-GO Technologies with the 'AR' referencing founder Alana Redmond.
description_cn: 这件橙色衬衫上印有南船座宇航的标志.在更名之前,该公司被称作AR-GO科技，其中"AR"源自创始人阿兰娜·雷德蒙(Alana Redmond)的名字缩写.
